body: When played by a character who has the Perform (wind instruments) skill, these shiny metallic pan pipes create a variety of sounds that can imitate creatures, environmental sounds, or most other sounds. The figment sounds are the equivalent of ghost sound.
name: Pipes of Sounding
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Pipes of Sounding
